__e: Well, Herman, I must say, it's nice to be back home... after a certain party forced us to take a plane all the way back from Kansas City.
I'm not sure which one did what and when she did it, but I do know I met one of 'em in Kansas City.
Anyway, she's coming home, and I hoped to persuade you to let her live with me, part of the time in the capital, part of the time in New York, and of course, Newport during the season.
So, they sent me to Kansas, and here I am.
You should go back to Kansas and get a rest from this!
We're from Kansas. Jayhawkers, and proud of it.
